metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10771 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the get_key function in parse.c in abcm2ps through 8.13.20 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10771` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

abcm2ps - 8.14.2-0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: abcm2ps package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.14.2-0.2').
